Package ragmad.graphics.sprite

Class SpriteSheet

java.lang.Object
ragmad.graphics.sprite.SpriteSheet
public class SpriteSheet extends Object
Hard Corded Enum values for the engine. If a sprite sheet needs to be added it can be added to this Enum directly.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteSheet

      public SpriteSheet​(String path)
      Initiate a spritesheet.
      Parameters:
      path - - The path to the sprite-sheet file. The path should contain even the extension.

  • Method Details

    • crop

      public void crop​(int xOffset, int yOffset, int width, int height, int[] pixels)
      Crops a specific sprite from the object's Sprite-Sheet.
      Parameters:
      xOffset - - x-axis: row of the sprite you want to crop from the photo
      yOffset - - y-axis: column of the sprite you want to crop from the spritesheet
      width - - The width of the sprite you want to crop
      height - - The height of the sprite you want to crop
      pixels - - a reference array of pixels in which the croppepd values will be fed into.

    • crop

      public void crop​(int xOffset, int yOffset, int width, int height, int[] pixels, int xPeak)
      Crops a specific sprite from the object's Sprite-Sheet.
      Parameters:
      xOffset - - x-axis: row of the sprite you want to crop from the photo
      yOffset - - y-axis: column of the sprite you want to crop from the spritesheet
      width - - The width of the sprite you want to crop
      height - - The height of the sprite you want to crop
      pixels - - a reference array of pixels in which the croppepd values will be fed into.
      xPeak - - the amount of x to be cropped
